channel.title: lsp-mode on ZJTOMOON.COM

item.title: Emacs Lsp Mode配置
item.description: go-mode go env -w GOPROXY=https://goproxy.io,direct go get golang.org/x/tools/gopls@latest shell-mode npm --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org i -g bash-language-server rust-mode emacs ~/.bashrc export RUST_SRC_PATH=/home/alex/software/rustc-1.34.2-src/src
